item.description: Data Communication Components # Representation of Data Communication # Data communication involves the exchange of information between two or more devices using a communication medium.

item.title: CN LAB
item.description: Program-1 : Network Command Explanation # tcpdump # tcpdump is a packet analyzer tool that allows you to capture and analyze network traffic.
